content:
This PR transports results proved for map_domain to analogous results for comap_domain.

It is a side effect of Laurent polynomials, where it is useful to work with the inclusion of polynomials into Laurent polynomials.

Eric already reviewed it and reworked it.

Does anyone else want to take a look?

It is now the PR on which the rest of what I have that is specific to Laurent polynomials depends.
Too late :joy:
Thanks anyway! If you prefer to look at the dependent PR #14085, it might be more interesting! :wink:
Have you thought about connecting Laurent polynomials with docs#laurent_series?
But I have no idea whether this is hard or not
I have not thought about it yet, but it should definitely be done! I may add a todo in the file, to remember about this! Thanks!
